attributes.action: Scrap the toll fee's on both the Mersey tunnels
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Scrap the toll fares for both the Kingsway and Queensway tunnels linking Liverpool and the Wirral.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Scrap the toll fee's on both the Mersey tunnels."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15060.asp

Prime Minister's Office
